<!--typescript_bot_welcome-->

Hey @jordanoverbye,

:unamused: Your PR doesn't modify any tests, so it's hard to know what's being fixed, and your changes might regress in the future. Please consider [adding tests](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#user-content-test-editing-an-existing-package) to cover the change you're making. Including tests allows this PR to be merged by yourself and the owners of this module.

***This can potentially save days of time for you!***

@jordanoverbye The CI build failed! Please [review the logs for more information](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/commit/3cc81dbde57a1b0eda6f69f539fa49b8d420adff/checks?check_suite_id=938074936).
